comments.text:
9.0a2 (2011-09-30)

The update window was blank.  Minimizing it and bringing it back up caused it to refresh and be viewable.
comments.raw_text:
9.0a2 (2011-09-30)

The update window was blank.  Minimizing it and bringing it back up caused it to refresh and be viewable.

comments.text: Seen this with other windows as well and I suspect this is bug is a duplicate. It definitely isn't an app update specific bug. There might be a better component to put this in than widget win32.

Created attachment 596740
blank safe mode dialog

jesup, did your "blank dialog" have a title and the contents were blank, like this screen shot?

I had someone encounter this on win7 after he updated to version 10.
(He crashed immediately except in safe mode. Reboot of the PC cleared it up)

comments.author: yussifcefet@gmail.com
comments.creator: yussifcefet@gmail.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Yussif Barcelos from comment #10)
> Hi! I'm interested to fix one bug, but I'm new no bugzilla. I want to work
> in this bug and try to fix it until 30th october. Could someone mentor me?

Hey Yussif,

Thank you for offering to help. One caveat however before we start here - everyone within mozilla is really busy right now due to pressing schedules. You probably won't get lots of timely feedback over a very short period time (now -> Oct 31). I would love to have you work on it, and I'd be happy to mentor you, but I can't promise we'll make your Oct. 31 deadline with this particular bug.

If you're still interested in taking a shot at a fix here, please let me know so we can get started.
